title: Generated report
mission: Rewrite runtime/outputs/QA_GATE.md to explicitly require and verify: (1) canonical report file exists (runtime/outputs/report/DRAFT_REPORT_v0.md), (2) exactly one pilot case study exists in runtime/outputs/case_studies/ and passes schema validation, (3) runtime/outputs/rights/RIGHTS_LOG.csv present and referenced by the pilot, (4) linkcheck report present with acceptable failure thresholds, (5) citation minimum fields satisfied. Ensure the gate outputs a machine-readable pass/fail report in runtime/outputs/qa/.
